channel.title: New Features & Releases on
channel.description: Recent content in New Features & Releases on

item.title: SeaMeet Release History
item.description: 03/28/2024 # Enhancement # Update the signup page: enhance signup experience New Meeting Notification: Added a close button without forcing a refresh. 03/14/2024 # New Features # Onboarding optimization: Enhanced onboarding experience for workspace creation and initial meeting guidance. Unregistered user notifications: Notifying users when they have used an unregistered account to send meeting invitations to the copilot. Plan description translation: Added translation to Plan Description. Bugfix # Resolved onboarding issue during workspace creation.
